sentence.Network_en: The water moved darkly around the body, unpleasantly thick and brown.
sentence.Network_cn: 黏稠的棕黑色污水在尸体周围流动着，非常恶心。

sentence.Network_en: The Heidlers are an unpleasantly hypocritical pair.
sentence.Network_cn: 海德勒夫妇很虚伪，很让人讨厌。

PerfectNetExp.abs: But Taiwan was also an unpleasantly repressive place ., 但是台湾也是饱受镇压的伤心之地.
unpleasantly cold and damp ., 令人不快的寒冷 , 潮湿.
He had been unpleasantly surprised., 他一直感到很惊讶 , 很气恼.
unpleasantly loud and penetrating ., 令人不愉快的和尖利的声音.

list.abs: clash thunderously 雷鸣般地撞击clash unpleasantly 不合意地冲突clash violently 猛烈撞击
多数英国人会认为美国人说话声音刺耳，缺乏音乐感（unpleasantly harsh and unmusical）；而美国人则会认为英国人说话声音憋在 …
unpleasantly sentimental ; cloying ., 过分多情的 ; 甜得发腻的.
In the holiday season one finds the trains unpleasantly full of people ., 节日期间 , 人们可以看到火车上拥挤不堪 , 人满为患.

entry.tran: 令人不快的；令人不舒服的
entry.def: If something is unpleasant, it gives you bad feelings, for example by making you feel upset or uncomfortable.

example.ex: The symptoms can be uncomfortable, unpleasant and serious...
example.tran: 那些症状可能令人不适，很不舒服甚至会比较严重。

example.ex: The vacuum has an unpleasant smell...
example.tran: 那个真空吸尘器有股很难闻的气味。

entry.def: An unpleasant person is very unfriendly and rude.

example.ex: She thought him an unpleasant man...
example.tran: 她认为他是个粗鲁的人。

example.ex: Don't start giving me problems otherwise I'll have to be very unpleasant indeed.
example.tran: 不要开始给我找麻烦，否则我就不客气了。

auth_sentence.content: The double scotch...makes a novice drinker feel unpleasantly intoxicated.
auth_sentence.res_content: The double scotch...makes a novice drinker feel unpleasantly intoxicated.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The double scotch...makes a novice drinker feel unpleasantly intoxicated.

auth_sentence.content: Flakes of whiteout litter the surface of the now unpleasantly hot Smith-Corona.
auth_sentence.res_content: Flakes of whiteout litter the surface of the now unpleasantly hot Smith-Corona.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Flakes of whiteout litter the surface of the now unpleasantly hot Smith-Corona.

auth_sentence.content: Summers are often unpleasantly hot with some danger of heat exhaustion or heatstroke.
auth_sentence.res_content: Summers are often unpleasantly hot with some danger of heat exhaustion or heatstroke.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Summers are often unpleasantly hot with some danger of heat exhaustion or heatstroke.

Sentence.sentence: This reminds me unpleasantly of Sunnyhill School in Streatham, with its harsh tarmac, where I used to hang about in corners fantasising about wildlife.
